title: I cant login to my account

profile.name: Legal Robot

vulnerability_information:
hey sir , 

new issue found 

when i reset my pass to my mail address asr82785611@gmail.com its done.

but when i try to signin it says password is not same as mail address.

i have changed my password successfully as my mailaddress , but it wont let me to login

activities.message:
We have told you repeatedly to stop unnecessary status requests and cross posting. After a careful review with our team, we have decided to ban you from our program because of the excessive posts and policy violations. We have been beyond patient with you, despite obvious violations like opening multiple accounts (@hulskar, @l337hulskar, @hulskar1997). We will complete work on the two remaining open reports and kindly ask you to not open any more accounts as a way to further circumvent reputation requirements.

* #261742 - 18 unnecessary posts.
* #263743 - 9 unnecessary posts. Closed and locked for excessive status requests. OP requested mediation.
* #264023 - Opened a duplicate of a report that was previously closed and locked (#263743) for excessive status requests, in violation of our policy.
* #257035 - 21 unnecessary posts. Completely out of hand.
* #260664 - 3 cross-posts and 1 unnecessary post.
* #260316 - 11 unnecessary posts, 1 cross post.
* #260239 - 10 unnecessary posts. Clearly out of scope in policy.
* #254838 - Unable to reproduce the issue. Dozens of unnecessary posts.
